attributes.action: Mental health subject-specific mentor per university course - weekly check-ins.
attributes.additional_details:
Due to the recent rising rates of UK university students suicides.,opo,opre3                                                                                                                                                                                                      
All University principles should follow this Government guideline.
Reduces pressure on University student services and programme / module leaders.
May reduce pressure on NHS mental health services.
attributes.background: Make subject-specific university course mentors part of the UK Government guidelines.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure what you mean by subject-specific university course mentors.
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
